definitions.definition: The condition in which the front wheels of a car fail to follow the desired curve while cornering , instead following more of a straight-line trajectory, losing a degree of traction , and so slipping off the required line.

main_definition: The condition in which the front wheels of a car fail to follow the desired curve while cornering , instead following more of a straight-line trajectory, losing a degree of traction , and so slipping off the required line.
